vote.title: Authorize the (1) ratification of $988,698.25 to pay outstanding invoices due to Family Endeavors, Inc. dba Endeavors for homeless shelter and dormitory management services related to COVID-1; (2) execution of a contract with Family Endeavors, Inc. dba Endeavors for ongoing services in an amount up to $1,253,625.25; and (3) ratification of $520,000.00 to pay outstanding invoices to Family Endeavors, Inc. dba Endeavors for emergency operation services due to displaced individuals from Hurricane Laura for the Office of Emergency Management - Total amount not to exceed $2,762,323.50 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Funds ($2,242,323.50) and Hurricane Laura Emergency Operations Fund ($520,000.00) (to be reimbursed by the State of Texas pursuant to a State of Texas Assistance Request (STAR) issued by the Texas Division of Emergency Management as authorized through Texas Government Code Chapter 418)
vote.description: Authorize the (1) ratification of $988,698.25 to pay outstanding invoices due to Family Endeavors, Inc. dba Endeavors for homeless shelter and dormitory management services related to COVID-1; (2) execution of a contract with Family Endeavors, Inc. dba Endeavors for ongoing services in an amount up to $1,253,625.25; and (3) ratification of $520,000.00 to pay outstanding invoices to Family Endeavors, Inc. dba Endeavors for emergency operation services due to displaced individuals from Hurricane Laura for the Office of Emergency Management - Total amount not to exceed $2,762,323.50 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Funds ($2,242,323.50) and Hurricane Laura Emergency Operations Fund ($520,000.00) (to be reimbursed by the State of Texas pursuant to a State of Texas Assistance Request (STAR) issued by the Texas Division of Emergency Management as authorized through Texas Government Code Chapter 418)
